Bone Metastasis or Bone with Lung Metastasis    Osteosarcoma and malignant fibrous histiocytoma may spread to a distant bone and/or the lung. Treatment may include the following:         - Combination chemotherapy followed by surgery to remove the primary tumor and the cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.
